previous.excerpt:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Solar_Sas 
Second Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqYaOZbuf8OK4SBoHSy5vBQ

Credit to @clayohr for the big tech art style parody image
and to Ori Toor for the image at 11:26 
3:45 short film is - CGI short film "Pharaoh" 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0yxXmE6w_4&t=100s

Music in order of Appearence: 
Kevin MacLeod - Crinoline Dreams
18 Carat Affair - Modus Operandi 
Kevin MacLeod - Samba Isobel 
Ryo Kawasaki - Sweet Tears
Tobacco - Refbatch

https://qz.com/quartzy/1728767/why-editorial-illustrations-look-so-similar-these-days/

A. M. Cassandre - Henri Mouron
previous.title: Why do "Corporate Art Styles" Feel Fake?

localize.title: 为什么 "企业艺术风格 "让人感觉很假？
localize.description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Solar_Sas 
第二频道：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqYaOZbuf8OK4SBoHSy5vBQ

归功于@clayohr的大科技艺术风格模仿图片
和奥里-托尔在11:26的图像。
3:45的短片是--CGI短片 "法老"。
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0yxXmE6w_4&t=100s

Kevin MacLeod - Crinoline Dreams.

localize.title: 爲什麼 "企業藝術風格 "讓人感覺很假？
localize.description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Solar_Sas 
第二頻道：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqYaOZbuf8OK4SBoHSy5vBQ

歸功於@clayohr的大科技藝術風格模仿圖片
和奧裏-托爾在11:26的圖像。
3:45的短片是--CGI短片 "法老"。
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0yxXmE6w_4&t=100s

音樂按出場順序排列: 
Kevin MacLeod - Crinoline Dreams.
18克拉事件------------運作模式 
凱文-麥克勞德-桑巴伊索貝爾 
川崎亮 - 甜蜜的眼淚
菸草 - Refbatch 
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
在知識共享協議下授權。按署名3.0許可
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

資料來源： 
https://qz.com/quartzy/1728767/why-editorial-illustrations-look-so-similar-these-days/
https://eyeondesign.aiga.org/dont-worry-these-gangley-armed-cartoons-are-here-to-protect-you-from-big-tech/

next.excerpt:
In Total War: WARHAMMER III each choice you make will shape the reality-shattering conflict to come; from the mysterious Lands of the East to the daemon-infested Realms of Chaos. Will you conquer your daemons? Or command them? Coming 2021.

Pre-purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
Pre-purchase on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
Any questions? Check out the FAQ: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WH3

Video type: Cinematic trailer
What does this mean? Full info here: ➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
next.title: Total War: WARHAMMER III Announce Trailer - Conquer Your Daemons | Coming 2021

localize.title: 全面战争：战锤III》公布预告片--征服你的守护神｜即将于2021年推出。
localize.description:
在《全面战争：战锤III》中，你所做的每一个选择都将影响到即将到来的现实破坏性冲突；从神秘的东方之地到被守护神侵袭的混沌之境。你是要征服你的守护神？还是指挥它们？即将于2021年推出。

Steam上预购：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
在Epic上预购：https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
有什么问题吗？请查看常见问题：https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WH3

视频类型: 电影预告片
这意味着什么？完整的信息在这里。➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers

localize.title: 全面戰爭：戰錘III》公佈預告片--征服你的守護神｜即將於2021年推出。
localize.description:
在《全面戰爭：戰錘III》中，你所做的每一個選擇都將影響到即將到來的現實破壞性衝突；從神祕的東方之地到被守護神侵襲的混沌之境。你是要征服你的守護神？還是指揮它們？即將於2021年推出。

Steam上預購：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
在Epic上預購：https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
有什麼問題嗎？請查看常見問題：https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WH3

視頻類型: 電影預告片
這意味着什麼？完整的信息在這裏。➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
